SEARCH
Package edu.kirkwood.model

Class Temperature

java.lang.Object
edu.kirkwood.model.Temperature
public class Temperature extends Object
Represents a temperature with a double degree value and a string scale (C, F, K). Supports conversion between scales basic arithmetic operations ( addition and substraction).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Temperature()
    Default constructor initializes to 0 Celsius.

    Constructs a new Temperature with a specified degree value and Scale.
